20110107154438.000|20110107154440.000|CC1|MAN'S SEXUAL INTEREST.          
20110107154440.000|20110107154441.000|CC1|MEDICAL CORRESPONDENT DR.       
20110107154441.000|20110107154442.000|CC1|JENNIFER ASHTON HAS THIS STORY. 
20110107154442.000|20110107154443.000|CC1|INTERESTING STORY.              
20110107154443.000|20110107154443.000|CC1|>> GOOD MORNING, CHRIS.         
20110107154443.000|20110107154445.000|CC1|>> SO WHAT DOES THIS RESEARCH   
20110107154445.000|20110107154445.000|CC1|TELL US?                        
20110107154445.000|20110107154447.000|CC1|>> THIS IS REALLY ABOUT TEARS   
20110107154447.000|20110107154451.000|CC1|AND WOMEN, MEN'S SCENT AND      
20110107154451.000|20110107154453.000|CC1|PHYSICAL ATTRACTIVENESS.        
20110107154453.000|20110107154455.000|CC1|WHEN MEN SMELL A WOMAN'S TEARS, 
20110107154455.000|20110107154457.000|CC1|THEIR LEVEL OF TESTOSTERONE GOES
20110107154457.000|20110107154459.000|CC1|DOWN AND THEY ARE LESS SEXUALLY 
20110107154459.000|20110107154500.000|CC1|ATTRACTED TO THAT WOMAN AND FIND
20110107154500.000|20110107154501.000|CC1|HER LESS ATTRACT I'VE.          
20110107154501.000|20110107154504.000|CC1|>> COMPARED TO OTHER MAMMALS,   
20110107154504.000|20110107154505.000|CC1|HUMANS THE ONLY ONES THAT CRY.  
20110107154505.000|20110107154507.000|CC1|WHAT ARE WE TALKING ABOUT AS FAR
20110107154507.000|20110107154508.000|CC1|AS THE FUNCTION OF TEARS.       
20110107154508.000|20110107154509.000|CC1|>> IT IS INTERESTING TO NOTE    
20110107154509.000|20110107154509.000|CC1|THAT.                           
20110107154509.000|20110107154511.000|CC1|WHAT TEARS DO IS LUBRICATE THE  
20110107154511.000|20110107154513.000|CC1|EYE, FLUSH OUT ANY DIRT, KEEP IT
20110107154513.000|20110107154513.000|CC1|CLEAN.                          
20110107154513.000|20110107154514.000|CC1|OBVIOUSLY WHEN YOU'RE TALKING   
20110107154514.000|20110107154515.000|CC1|ABOUT EMOTION, IT'S ALSO        
20110107154515.000|20110107154519.000|CC1|SOMETIMES A WAY TO EXPRESS      
20110107154519.000|20110107154521.000|CC1|YOURSELF, TEARS OF JOY, TEARS OF
20110107154521.000|20110107154521.000|CC1|SADNESS, TEARS OF GRIEF.        
20110107154521.000|20110107154524.000|CC1|AS WE'RE SEEING MORE AND MORE,  
20110107154524.000|20110107154525.000|CC1|SOME PEOPLE HAVE A GREATER      
20110107154525.000|20110107154527.000|CC1|PROPENSITY TO CRY THAN OTHERS.  
20110107154527.000|20110107154529.000|CC1|>> TEARS HAVE BEEN MAKING       
20110107154529.000|20110107154530.000|CC1|HEADLINES RECENTLY.             
20110107154530.000|20110107154532.000|CC1|HOUSE SPEAKER JOHN BOEHNER IS A 
20110107154532.000|20110107154532.000|CC1|CRYER.                          
20110107154532.000|20110107154534.000|CC1|WHAT MAKES SOME PEOPLE BIGGER   
20110107154534.000|20110107154535.000|CC1|CRYERS THAN OTHERS?             
20110107154535.000|20110107154536.000|CC1|>> THEY DON'T KNOW.             
20110107154536.000|20110107154538.000|CC1|SOME OF THE THEORIES INCLUDE    
20110107154538.000|20110107154538.000|CC1|HORMONES.                       
20110107154538.000|20110107154540.000|CC1|MEN WITH HIGHER TESTOSTERONE    
20110107154540.000|20110107154542.000|CC1|MAYBE TEND TO CRY LESS.
